(Dark • Ambient • Vaporwave • Soft Rain • Deep Focus)
## 1. TRACK OVERVIEW
| Field | Value |
| Arc Name | Neon Rain / Night Coding — Master Song Bank Arc |
| Purpose | Reusable prompt arc for generating cohesive nighttime tracks |
| Duration Intent | 3 hours (18 tracks × ~10 min or variable Suno extensions) |
| Mood Arc | Neon Rain Calm → Deep Focus Pulse → Midnight Drift → Vaporwave Fade |
| Anchor Phrase | neon rain focus flow |
## 2. MUSIC ARC STRUCTURE — 18 SUNO PROMPTS
## 5. MUSIC ARC STRUCTURE — Suno Prompts
### PHASE 1 — Neon Rain Calm (BPM 50–58)
- [ ] 1. soft ambient pads, soft rain texture, gentle harmonic movement, minimal motion — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 2. airy vaporwave pads, distant city hush, slow harmonic drift, calm stillness — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 3. layered analog warmth, quiet nocturnal energy, subtle tonal shifts, gentle drift — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 4. warm analog pads, rain-washed calm, smooth harmonic flow, relaxed motion — vaporwave synthwave lofi
### PHASE 2 — Deep Focus Pulse (BPM 56–64)
- [ ] 5. gentle lofi pulse, neon rain ambience, warm analog bass, soft steady flow — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 6. muted rhythmic elements, deep night calm, smooth harmonic progression, quiet energy — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 7. soft steady beat, distant city hush, slow chord progression, relaxed motion — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 8. gentle lofi groove, analog desk warmth, subtle harmonic evolution, controlled flow — vaporwave synthwave lofi
### PHASE 3 — Midnight Drift (BPM 64–72)
- [ ] 9. soft complex chords, quiet midnight drift, spacious resonance, gentle motion — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 10. layered analog warmth, deep night calm, slow harmonic movement, calm drift — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 11. vintage synth atmosphere, gentle nocturnal energy, subtle tonal shifts, quiet depth — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 12. warm analog layers, night dissolving, smooth harmonic flow, steady calm — vaporwave synthwave lofi
### PHASE 4 — Vaporwave Fade (BPM 56–64)
- [ ] 13. soft ambient pads, rain-washed calm, slow harmonic drift, gentle stillness — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 14. airy vaporwave pads, quiet nocturnal haze, subtle resonance, calm drift — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 15. layered analog warmth, distant city hush, gentle harmonic movement, minimal motion — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 16. vintage synth atmosphere, deep night calm, slow tonal shifts, relaxed motion — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 17. warm analog pads, soft rain ambience, stable harmonic center, quiet stillness — vaporwave synthwave lofi
- [ ] 18. soft ambient layers, night fading away, gentle harmonic resolution, slow evolution — vaporwave synthwave lofi
